data.comment: The big names in today's match at Covebo Stadion - De Koel have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 3, An attacking Den Haag player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Venlo's Roy Gelmi has been booked in Venlo.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Shaquille Pinas.
In the minute 5, Giorgos Giakoumakis grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
The first half has been concluded at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Bas Nijhuis has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Delano Van Crooij is replacing Thorsten Kirschbaum for Venlo at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Evert Linthorst (Venlo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Milan van Ewijk (Den Haag) has received a yellow card from Bas Nijhuis.
In the minute 62, Arjan Swinkels is on a sub for Zinedine Machach for Venlo.
The away team have replaced Samy Bourard with Ilay Elmkies. This is the first substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
Venlo make their third substitution with Aaron Bastiaans replacing Guus Hupperts.
In the minute 74, Aleksandar Rankovic (Den Haag) is making a second substitution, with Michiel Kramer replacing Jonas Arweiler.
David Lennart Philipp is replacing Amar Catic for the away team.
The home team replace Joshua John with Jafar Arias.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
David Lennart Philipp scores to make it 1-2 at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
